item.title: OR-230 West Approaching OR-62
item.description: OR-230 West approaching OR-62. Use OR-62 North to Crater Lake.

item.title: End Forest Road 6530 at OR-230
item.description: End Forest Road 6530 at OR-230 at the Jackson/Douglas County Line.

item.title: OR-230 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-230 west. Distance to Prospect, Crater Lake (via OR-62 North) and Medford (via OR-62 South).

item.title: OR-230 West - Douglas County
item.description: OR-230 west in Douglas County. Taken just west of Diamond Lake.

item.title: OR-138 West at OR-230
item.description: OR-138 West at OR-230 west to Diamond Lake South Shore and Medford. On the day this photograph was taken a forest fire had closed down OR-230 west, as well as the campgrounds at nearby Diamond Lake. Continue west on OR-138 for Diamond Lake North Shore and Roseburg.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching OR-230
item.description: OR-138 West approaching OR-230 south to Medford.

item.title: OR-62 West at OR-230 East
item.description: OR-62 west at OR-230 east to Diamond Lake and Bend. Use OR-62 west for Medford.

item.title: OR-62 West Approching OR-230
item.description: OR-62 west approaching OR-230 east to Diamond Lake.

item.title: End OR-230 North at OR-138
item.description: Northern end of OR-230 at OR-138 to Roseburg and Bend.

item.title: OR-62 North at OR-230
item.description: OR-62 north at OR-230 to Diamond Lake and Bend.
